keywords.name: Activate
keywords.description: Trigger the effect of the current Trail power.

keywords.name: Colored
keywords.description: Refers to the basic cards and the cards in the card pool of each character, excluding any colorless cards, colorless derivative cards, Status, and Curse.

keywords.name: Deepbreath
keywords.description: Shuffle your discard pile into your draw pile, and draw 1 card.

keywords.name: Deflect
keywords.description: When receiving Attack damage, deals damage back, and decrease the amount by half(Round down).

keywords.name: Initial
keywords.description: Automatically gain the Trail at start of combat, temporarily purge this card from the deck until you play another Sword.

keywords.name: Instate
keywords.description:
Start each battle with this card in your hand just like Innate.
Draw all Instate card into your hand when it's the first draw after shuffling your draw pile.

keywords.name: Light_matter
keywords.description:
A series of derivative cards with Retent or similar keywords (Such as Retain or Ethereal).
This card will be Exhausted when it enters the discard pile.

keywords.name: Retent
keywords.description:
Effects like Retain . The number behind Retent will decrease by 1 whenever this card is Ratained .
This card will have Ethereal instead of Retain if the number decreases to 0.

keywords.name: Sword
keywords.description:
A type of card with a unique Trail.
Playing a Sword card will temporarily purge it, switch the current Trail, and return the Sword card of the original Trail to your hand (The cost will become the initial state).

keywords.name: Trail
keywords.description: Trigger different effects when Activated. Different Trails correspond to a unique Sword.

keywords.name: Valor
keywords.description:
When you obtain 3 Valor, enter Warrior.
Upon entering Warrior, shuffle your discard pile into your draw pile.
In Warrior ，you deal 33% more attack damage，you receive 25% less attack damage.
At start of your turn, lose 1 Valor. When you lose all of them, exit Warrior.

keywords.name: Warrior
keywords.description:
Upon entering this Stance, shuffle your discard pile into your draw pile.
In this Stance，you deal 33% more attack damage，you receive 25% less attack damage.
At start of your turn, lose 1 Valor. When you lose all of them, exit this Stance.

mods.name: The Solidified
mods.description: 本mod添加了一个完全自创的角色：固光剑士the Solidified，一位稚嫩的剑士，为了解自己的身世来到尖塔。使用不同的“剑”并操控“光”来战斗，以稳定能力见长。 This mod add a Original Character: The Solidified. A young warrior, came to the spire to explore his identity. Using different "Swords" and controls "Light" to fight, excels at stability ability.
